description_thought: Selected the most comprehensive and relevant content from the 'Mission / Vision' page (file 5) under the 'Our Mission' and 'Our Vision' sections.
description: NTT DOCOMO Ventures aims to transform the global landscape by uniting talent and visions, leveraging the NTT Group's deployment expertise to create impactful growth and change. It focuses on uniting startups with the NTT Group to foster outsized impact and growth, driving the future with united vision and talent. The vision of NTT DOCOMO Ventures is to change the world by bringing together talent and enthusiasm in a dynamic global corporate venture capital environment, linking startups' innovative concepts with the NTT Group's deployment expertise to create unprecedented world-changing impacts.
